text: One more thing. I think Guy would really get a kick out of Bruce Sterling's talk in Copenhagen, in 2009. Everything Guy and Dr Milkman said in his latest show has happened in my own life. Big changes in your life are good times to head off in new directions. I've done it a fair number of times myself. That's what Sterling, a famous science fiction author, was talking about. How to use those big turns in your life, to have a more interesting life.
